summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3516 for the improvement of West 59th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44757, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
